list.name: flight_id
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT flight_id FROM baggage.bag_latest ORDER BY flight_id
list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT flight_id FROM baggage.bag_latest ORDER BY flight_id

targets.query: SELECT stage, count() AS bags FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN event_type = 'CheckedIn' THEN 'checked_in' WHEN event_type IN ('Inducted','ScreenedCleared','MakeupArrived') THEN 'in_transit' WHEN event_type = 'LoadedOnAircraft' THEN 'on_plane' WHEN event_type IN ('Offloaded','CarouselArrived') THEN 'arrived' ELSE 'other' END AS stage FROM baggage.bag_latest WHERE flight_id = '$flight_id' ) GROUP BY stage ORDER BY stage
targets.rawSql: SELECT stage, count() AS bags FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN event_type = 'CheckedIn' THEN 'checked_in' WHEN event_type IN ('Inducted','ScreenedCleared','MakeupArrived') THEN 'in_transit' WHEN event_type = 'LoadedOnAircraft' THEN 'on_plane' WHEN event_type IN ('Offloaded','CarouselArrived') THEN 'arrived' ELSE 'other' END AS stage FROM baggage.bag_latest WHERE flight_id = '$flight_id' ) GROUP BY stage ORDER BY stage

targets.query: SELECT stage, count() AS bags FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN event_type = 'CheckedIn' THEN 'checked_in' WHEN event_type IN ('Inducted','ScreenedCleared','MakeupArrived') THEN 'in_transit' WHEN event_type = 'LoadedOnAircraft' THEN 'on_plane' WHEN event_type IN ('Offloaded','CarouselArrived') THEN 'arrived' ELSE 'other' END AS stage FROM baggage.bag_latest WHERE flight_id = '$flight_id' ) GROUP BY stage ORDER BY bags DESC
targets.rawSql: SELECT stage, count() AS bags FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN event_type = 'CheckedIn' THEN 'checked_in' WHEN event_type IN ('Inducted','ScreenedCleared','MakeupArrived') THEN 'in_transit' WHEN event_type = 'LoadedOnAircraft' THEN 'on_plane' WHEN event_type IN ('Offloaded','CarouselArrived') THEN 'arrived' ELSE 'other' END AS stage FROM baggage.bag_latest WHERE flight_id = '$flight_id' ) GROUP BY stage ORDER BY bags DESC

targets.query: SELECT bag_id, airport, event_type, event_time FROM baggage.bag_latest WHERE flight_id = '$flight_id' ORDER BY event_time DESC LIMIT 300
targets.rawSql: SELECT bag_id, airport, event_type, event_time FROM baggage.bag_latest WHERE flight_id = '$flight_id' ORDER BY event_time DESC LIMIT 300

targets.query: SELECT toStartOfInterval(event_time, INTERVAL 1 minute) AS ts, count() AS events FROM baggage.bag_events WHERE flight_id = '$flight_id' AND event_time >= $__timeFrom() AND event_time <= $__timeTo() GROUP BY ts ORDER BY ts
targets.rawSql: SELECT toStartOfInterval(event_time, INTERVAL 1 minute) AS ts, count() AS events FROM baggage.bag_events WHERE flight_id = '$flight_id' AND event_time >= $__timeFrom() AND event_time <= $__timeTo() GROUP BY ts ORDER BY ts
